scripts.install-dev: echo '# Installing all libraries on host for code editor support. TODO how to minimize as --only=dev affects devDepencies also?' && npm-run-all install-all
scripts.install-all: npm-run-all install-all:admin install-all:client install-all:shared install-all:server install-all:worker install-all:www
scripts.install-all:admin: echo admin libs... && cd admin && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.install-all:client: echo client libs... && cd client && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.install-all:server: echo server libs... && cd server && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.install-all:shared: echo shared libs... && cd shared && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.install-all:worker: echo worker libs... && cd worker && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.install-all:www: echo www libs... && cd www && npm install || echo WARNING: Some libs failed to install
scripts.taito-init:clean: taito -z ${taito_options} init:${taito_env} --clean && npm-run-all import-db-data clean:storage generate
scripts.import-db-data: if [ -f ./database/data/${taito_env}.sql ]; then taito ${taito_options} db import:${taito_env} ./database/data/${taito_env}.sql; fi
scripts.clean:storage: if [ ${taito_env} = 'local' ] && [ -d storage ]; then echo Cleaning storage; rm -rf ./storage/bucket/*; rm -rf ./storage/.minio.sys/buckets/bucket/*/; fi
scripts.generate:client: if [ ${taito_env} = 'local' ] && [ -f ./client/generate.sh ]; then (cd client && ./generate.sh); else echo Nothing to generate; fi
scripts.generate:server: if [ ${taito_env} = 'local' ] && [ -f ./server/generate.sh ]; then (cd server && ./generate.sh); else echo Nothing to generate; fi
scripts.lint: echo Running lint locally && npm-run-all --parallel lint:admin lint:client lint:server lint:worker lint:www
scripts.unit: echo Running unit tests locally && npm-run-all --parallel unit:admin unit:client unit:server unit:worker unit:www
scripts.test: npm-run-all test:admin test:client test:server test:worker test:www
scripts.code-check: docker run --interactive --tty --rm --env CODECLIMATE_CODE="$PWD" --volume "$PWD":/code --volume /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --volume /tmp/cc:/tmp/cc codeclimate/codeclimate engines:install && docker run --interactive --tty --rm --env CODECLIMATE_CODE="$PWD" --volume "$PWD":/code --volume /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --volume /tmp/cc:/tmp/cc codeclimate/codeclimate analyze
scripts._dep-check_comment: TODO how to pass -u argument from dep-check to dep-check:TARGET?
scripts._dep-check-script: sh -c 'echo --- ${0} --- && cd ${0} && (npm-check ${@} || :) && echo && echo "NOTE: Many of the devDependencies and ~ references are actually in use even if reported unused. But all unused dependencies can usually be removed from package.json." && echo'
scripts.size-check:admin: cd admin && echo --- admin --- && npm run analyze --
scripts.size-check:client: cd client && echo --- client --- && npm run analyze --
scripts.project-show: cat PROJECT.md | sed -n -e '/^## Contacts.*$/,/^#.*$/{ /^## Contacts.*$/d; /^#.*$/d; p; }'
scripts.precommit:branch: if git-branch-is -q test || git-branch-is -q uat || git-branch-is -q qa || git-branch-is -q stag || git-branch-is -q canary || git-branch-is -q cana || git-branch-is -q prod || git-branch-is -q master; then echo 'ERROR: You cannot commit changes directly to this environment branch. Only fast-forward merge is allowed.' && echo && exit 1; fi
scripts.precommit:lint: echo 'SKIP: Skipping linting on commit since we are already continuously linting during development.'

hooks.pre-commit: if [ "$taito_mode" != 'ci' ]; then npm-run-all precommit:branch precommit:lint; fi
hooks.pre-push: if [ "$taito_mode" != 'ci' ]; then npm-run-all --parallel generate lint unit; fi
